#labels api,model
Object level method which allows you to update the values of an object and save it to the database. You can pass in both named arguments and/or an attributes struct. This method return true if the object was saved successfully to the database and false otherwise.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| attributes || yes, if no named arguments are present || struct || || attribute name/value pairs ||
|| named argument(s) || yes, if no `attributes` argument is present || || || attribute value (the argument name should match the name of the attribute) ||

Examples:
{{{
<cfset post = model("post").findByID(33)>
<cfset post.update(title = "New version of Wheels just released")>
}}}
{{{
<cfset last_post = model("post").findOne(order="posted_at DESC")>
<cfset last_post.update(request.params.post)>
}}}
{{{
<cfset post = model("post").findByID(33)>
<cfset post.update(title="New version of Wheels just released", attributes=request.params.post)>
}}}
